# Arrow, Reeking
## Overview
**Arrow, Reeking:** An arrow enchanted with a *[[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]]* spell that is released on impact (Fortitude DC 11).


| **Martial Weapons** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range** | **Weight** | **Type** |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Arrow, Reeking (1) | 50 gp | 1d6 | 1d8 | ×3 | — | 20/3 lbs. | P |

 **Source:** Midgard Campaign Setting (Open Design), pg. 94
